00008 /*
00009  * bstraux.h
00010  *
00011  * This file is not a necessary part of the core bstring library itself, but
00012  * is just an auxilliary module which includes miscellaneous or trivial 
00013  * functions.
00014  */
00015 
00016 #ifndef BSTRAUX_INCLUDE
00017 #define BSTRAUX_INCLUDE
00018 
00019 #include <time.h>
00020 #include "bstrlib.h"

00023 extern "C" {

00026 /* Safety mechanisms */
00027 #define bstrDeclare(b)               bstring (b) = NULL; 
00028 #define bstrFree(b)                  {if ((b) != NULL && (b)->slen >= 0 && (b)->mlen >= (b)->slen) { bdestroy (b); (b) = NULL; }}
00029 
00030 /* Backward compatibilty with previous versions of Bstrlib */
00031 #define bAssign(a,b)                 ((bassign)((a), (b)))
00032 #define bSubs(b,pos,len,a,c)         ((breplace)((b),(pos),(len),(a),(unsigned char)(c)))
00033 #define bStrchr(b,c)                 ((bstrchr)((b), (c)))
00034 #define bStrchrFast(b,c)             ((bstrchr)((b), (c)))
00035 #define bCatCstr(b,s)                ((bcatcstr)((b), (s)))
00036 #define bCatBlk(b,s,len)             ((bcatblk)((b),(s),(len)))
00037 #define bCatStatic(b,s)              bCatBlk ((b), ("" s ""), sizeof (s) - 1)
00038 #define bTrunc(b,n)                  ((btrunc)((b), (n)))
00039 #define bReplaceAll(b,find,repl,pos) ((bfindreplace)((b),(find),(repl),(pos)))
00040 #define bUppercase(b)                ((btoupper)(b))
00041 #define bLowercase(b)                ((btolower)(b))
00042 #define bCaselessCmp(a,b)            ((bstricmp)((a), (b)))
00043 #define bCaselessNCmp(a,b,n)         ((bstrnicmp)((a), (b), (n)))
00044 #define bBase64Decode(b)             (bBase64DecodeEx ((b), NULL))
00045 #define bUuDecode(b)                 (bUuDecodeEx ((b), NULL))
00046

00049 extern bstring bTail (bstring b, int n);

00054 extern int bReplicate (bstring b, int n);
00055 extern int bReverse (bstring b);
00056 extern int bInsertChrs (bstring b, int pos, int len, unsigned char c, unsigned char fill);
00057 extern bstring bStrfTime (const char * fmt, const struct tm * timeptr);
00058 #define bAscTime(t) (bStrfTime ("%c\n", (t)))
00059 #define bCTime(t)   ((t) ? bAscTime (localtime (t)) : NULL)

00078 /* Writable stream */
00079 typedef int (* bNwrite) (const void * buf, size_t elsize, size_t nelem, void * parm);
00080 
00081 struct bwriteStream * bwsOpen (bNwrite writeFn, void * parm);

00089 /* Security functions */
00090 #define bSecureDestroy(b) {                                                 \
00091 bstring bstr__tmp = (b);                                                    \
00092         if (bstr__tmp && bstr__tmp->mlen > 0 && bstr__tmp->data) {          \
00093             (void) memset (bstr__tmp->data, 0, (size_t) bstr__tmp->mlen);   \
00094             bdestroy (bstr__tmp);                                           \
00095         }                                                                   \
00096 }
00097 #define bSecureWriteProtect(t) {                                                      \
00098         if ((t).mlen >= 0) {                                                          \
00099             if ((t).mlen > (t).slen)) {                                               \
00100                 (void) memset ((t).data + (t).slen, 0, (size_t) (t).mlen - (t).slen); \
00101             }                                                                         \
00102             (t).mlen = -1;                                                            \
00103         }                                                                             \
00104 }
00105 extern bstring bSecureInput (int maxlen, int termchar, 
00106                              bNgetc vgetchar, void * vgcCtx);
